translation.Name: Buak_Note_20
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: After yet another incident yesterday. People are right back to being miserable. Right after I gave them a raise, too! What a waste. And as if such a simple slip up couldnâ€™t make things worse- I lost an entire floor of my facility. We have guns for a reason! The entire security arm needs to be fired for not firing off a single bullet when they had the chance.
